name: Saul Mill
description: I am not crazy! I know he sawed those lumbers! I knew it was 1216 logs. One after Magna Carta. As if I could ever make such a mistake. Never. Never! I just – I just couldn't prove it. He – he covered his tracks, he got that idiot at the saw mill to lie for him. You think this is something? You think this is bad? This? This chicanery? He's done worse. That Balsa! Are you telling me that a tree just happens to fall like that? No! He orchestrated it! Jimmy! He defecated on a redwood! And I saved him! And I shouldn't have. I took him into my own mill! What was I thinking? He'll never change. He'll never change! Ever since he was 9, always the same! Couldn't keep his hands out of the chop saw! But not our Jimmy! Couldn't be precious Jimmy! Sawing them blind! And he gets to be a lumberjack!? What a sick joke! I should've stopped him when I had the chance! And you – you have to stop him! You-
